attributes.action: Ask Theresa May to explain to school children why only some will get lunch now.
attributes.background: I relied on free school dinners growing up. Taking them away punishes innocent children. It is barbaric to take away from the poorest members of society, the very ones we should be helping. How will those who cannot eat lunch at school survive? Shame on the UK Government

rejection.details:
If you'd like the Government to change its policy, you may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/215007
